title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Live deals hit new price lows this week
author: tabitha-baker
article: Samsung Galaxy Buds Live deals have been settling around the $139.99 mark over the last few weeks in the US, however today marks a brand new price drop that will send you home with a pair of Samsung's latest true wireless earbuds for their lowest price yet.

Amazon has just listed the buds at $126.75 (was $179.99), beating out the Black Friday record low by $3. We've only come close to that price during the November sales so far, and it only lasted a week – so you're getting another shot at an incredibly popular discount here.

Not only that, but if you're in the UK, you can also grab the Samsung Galaxy Buds Live for their lowest price yet, as ChitterChatter has just dropped the true wireless earbuds back down to £109.99 (was £179.99).
You'll find all of today's best Samsung Galaxy Buds Live deals just below, but you'll find more Samsung Galaxy Buds sales available across the web as well.
Not in the US? Scroll down for more Samsung Galaxy Buds deals where you are.

We're tracking all the latest headphone deals right here on TechRadar, but if you're not sure about Samsung's offerings you can also check out the latest cheap AirPods sales and AirPods Pro deals as well.
